entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt's deep voice was audible even over the surrounding chatter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry caught the sound of his own name.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Kingsley mentioned Dumbledore's reasons for not making Harry a prefect.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Harry followed Mundungus back toward the table.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody was sniffing at a chicken leg with what remained of his nose.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet was mentioned as having a go at Harry every few days.

relationships.description: Kingsley mentioned Dumbledore's reasons for not making Harry a prefect.
Lupin replied to Kingsley's question about why Dumbledore didn't make Harry a prefect.
Kingsley mentioned that the Daily Prophet was having a go at Harry every few days.
